Art:


Surviv.io:

This art includes everything that I submitted to the game developers of Surviv.io through concepts made by the community. These pieces of art are among those that were selected to be included into the game!

This art includes everything that I have designed for Surviv.io that has not made it into the game (yet).

This website was created by Francis McKee in 2022-2023 by utilizing Github Pages, and was programmed fully in CSS, HTML, and Javascript. SiteMap
